message.content: {"id": "18016", "title": "Most menu actions should be disabled for customers from repo", "description": "Currently, most menu actions are enabled for customers from the repo, which should not be the case. These menu actions should be disabled for such customers. However, the rest of the description is meaningless and should be removed.", "OB": "Currently, menu actions are enabled for customers from the repo", "EB": "Menu actions should be disabled for customers from the repo", "SR": "Disable menu actions for customers from the repo"}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '18016', 'title': 'Bug 18016most menu actions should be disabled for cus from repo', 'description': 'Bug 18016most menu actions should be disabled for cus from repo )but the rest is meaningless and they should be removed.3. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': "also 'convert line delimiters' should be disabled4. ", 'SR': ''}
